segments.text: Hello , this is John . I want to speak to Linda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , Linda , I'm just calling to invite you to a dinner party tomorrow evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 7:30 PM at London-Chinese restaurant . I \ ' ll be at your place at seven to pick you up if you need a ride .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please , I'll need a ride . I'll be waiting for you then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See you tomorrow at seven . Make sure your dress a little formally . I heard the restaurant is kind of upscale .
segments.speaker: S2
